title: CoI-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Online Language Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Blended course promoting collaborative learning in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners write three or more questions/feedback expressing social presence using an online discussion platform.
Learners generate two or more argumentative responses demonstrating cognitive presence while collaborating with peers to solve language tasks.
Learners develop at least one collaborative learning strategy to overcome technical constraints with instructor guidance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
